snippet: A livery van driver was arrested on Wednesday in the fatal shooting of a second driver who the police believe was a competitor in the network of unlicensed dollar vans.
abstract: Queens livery van driver Fabian Sullivan is charged in shooting death of Leon Brown, competitor in unlicensed transportation network known as dollar vans; police say that Sullivan shot Brown in the chest after cornering his van near an intersection in the Rockaways.
lead_paragraph: A livery van driver was arrested on Wednesday in the fatal shooting of a second driver who the police believe was a competitor in the network of unlicensed dollar vans.

headline.main: Queens Van Driver Accused of Fatally Shooting a Rival
headline.print_headline: Queens Van Driver Accused of Fatally Shooting a Rival
